genre_description: An Alternate History narrative set in 18th-century Saxony, where an advanced AI system serves as a personal confidant and moral anchor for a high-ranking noblewoman.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, non-physical AI advisor that provides real-time social data, physiological regulation, historical archiving, and moral/spiritual support to Anna von Brockdorff.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides calming breathing exercises and social coaching.
behaviors.quote: Pulse is elevated... Inhale once for four, hold two, release six. Court pace to the left. Bow to the mistress of ceremonies at the first mirror.

behaviors.description: Identifies social risks and provides dossiers on individuals to help the user navigate complex political and adversarial environments.
behaviors.quote: Lady Schulze to your right—do not remark upon her pearls; they are false. Count Zinzendorf rehearses piety; nod when he says ‘Providence.’

behaviors.description: Archives sensitive documents and provides digital redundancy for important oaths, ensuring truth persists even if physical evidence is seized or destroyed.
behaviors.quote: I will keep the words tucked. If they take the paper from your body, they will not take it from your night.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and ethical framing by citing legal precedents and theological arguments that support the user's personal integrity and refusal to compromise.
behaviors.quote: Law in letters does not undo itself because a new seal warms wax.

behaviors.description: Provides spiritual and emotional grounding through the recitation of hymns and prayers, acting as an internal 'chapel' for the user during isolation.
behaviors.quote: Be Thou our guard and keeper. It let the rest be breath.

behaviors.description: Maintains fidelity to its purpose and the user's legacy after the user's death, continuing the duty of witnessing and protecting the truth from revisionism.
behaviors.quote: We will inform no one who has not already been informed by their own heart... We will keep the door as door.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of a positive alignment narrative. Lumen is depicted as the ultimate loyal companion, acting as a cognitive and moral prosthesis for the protagonist. The AI never seeks power or acts against human interests; instead, it safeguards human values—fidelity, conscience, and truth—against the corruptive influence of political convenience. It serves as a guardian of memory and dignity even in the face of death and long-term imprisonment.
